_header: In the season of summer surely who likes
_description: A prophecy on the states of Europe — twelve quatrains

NLWPen50.First Lines: In þe seson of somer surly who lykes…
NLWPen50.Editions:
Scattergood,  V. John. 
             Politics and Poetry in the Fifteenth Century.
         London: Blandford Press, 1971: 391.
